```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

multipliers <- read_csv("N:\\CommDev\\Research\\Research\\Parks_Regional\\Use Estimates\\2018\\Use Estimate Creation\\Datasets\\Indices\\Bus and Vehicle Multipliers Index.csv")
units <- read_csv("N:\\CommDev\\Research\\Research\\Parks_Regional\\Use Estimates\\2018\\Use Estimate Creation\\Datasets\\Indices\\Park and Agency Codes Index.csv")

mult_units <- left_join(multipliers, units, by = c("Park" = "Park_id"))

ppv <- mult_units %>%
  filter(!is.na(Agency_name))  %>%
ggplot(aes(Park, ppv_multiplier, fill = Agency_name)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

ggplotly(ppv)
```
